poem:
### Silence of the Law

In shadows of authority, trust decayed,  
Young voices silenced, innocence betrayed.  
Through corridors of power, secrets seeped,  
Where whispers of justice were made to sleep.  
Beneath the badge, the darkness crept,  
Innocence stolen, while justice wept.  
A haunting echo of pain, unheard,  
In a world where truth is deferred.
